data.actual_result: The dark grey box that highlights it gets cut off when scrolling to the right
data.expected_result: The dark grey box should be there even when scrolling right but instead gets cut off
data.short_description: When adding a webhook to a long named text channel, the selected text channel appears half dark grey.
data.steps_to_repro: - Create a text channel with a long name - Create a webhook for it - Select the long channel - Scroll to the right with the bar - Observe
